Oh! Oh! Oh dear! What on earth is wrong with your face, ?! Wasps, I presume? You really should be more careful! They'll ruin that darling complexion of yours.
My stars! Your face looks like it lost an argument with some wasps!Don't worry, . It WILL go downeventually.Though if you want it to heal faster, you should take some medicine.

Mother of pearl! What happened to your face?You've gone and got yourself stung by wasps, haven't you? Good grief, darling, what WERE you thinking?Well, at least you have good timing. I just so happen to have medicine I can share with you.
One must always be prepared. After all, getting stung by a wasp is SUCH a buzzkill. Hahaha! BUZZkill, get it? Because they're wasps!Oh, I'm sorry—does it hurt to laugh?

Oh—oh my word! Your face looks likeWell, it looks like it met the pointy end of some very angry wasps.If you don't want to make babies cry when they see you, you best take some medicine as soon as possible.
Ah, that's it! I know what to do.I don't have any medicine on me at the momentbut I can teach you the recipe so you can make some.
As long as you remember that recipe, you can make your own medicine.Surely that will come in handy next time you decide to pick a fight with a gang of wasps, .
